content.c_description: Every day, marketers set out to deliver the perfect ad on the perfect platform at the perfect time. We like to call that personalization, but it's more like interruption. In this Yext Talk, Lexi Bohonnon, SVP of Sales Engineering at Yext, discusses how a modern search experience is key to a great customer experience.
content.yext/name: The Next Big Thing in Customer Delight
